item.description:
WHEN: October 11, 2009 12:00 NOON

WHERE: Hopkinton State Park
268 Cedar St
Hopkinton, MA 01748

Johanna and Nancy from Worc Singles Meetup are hosting this event and have invited several meetups to this. FALL FUN DAY AT HOPKINTON STATE PARK . There's plenty of room for fun in the beautiful lake for kayaking or canoeing, 10+ miles of hiking trails, plenty of picnic tables and grills to use! Our hope is to also have games like volleyball, bocce, cards for playing pitch or any other activity of interest. We are also suggesting board games of a group nature such as Taboo, Mad Gab, Scrabble or Dirty Minds for anyone who has it, I hear it's a riot!!! Any other suggestions or good ideas please bring them!

We have invited other groups for this event!!! Should be a great turnout!

Please note that the park charges $5 per car for parking. Follow "Meetup" signs to find the group.

Here's what we've got so far.

Nancy B - finger sandwiches
Amy - spinach dip, crackers, chips
Denise - Boneless Buffalo Wings
Charlene - bruschetta
Diane - chicken salad roll up sandwiches
Donna - something yummy
Bob P - desserts
Charles - dill pickles
Linda - macaroni salad, table cloths, maybe brownies
Nancy - Salmon
Appetizers - Nancy S & Annette
Chips & Dips - Linda
Lynne - Salads
Nancy S - Soda, water
Andrea - brownies
Michelle - choc chip cookies
Susan - carrot cookies
Donna - something yummy
Charles - Dill Pickles
Jacki - dessert (cake), signs
Tara - fruit salad

Charcoal, (instant light works best)

Andrea - Paper goods(plates, cups, napkins, utensils, trash bags
item.name: FALL FUN DAY! HIKE, KAYAK, GAMES, POT LUCK & MORE....
